def sum_of_cubes(n):
    total = 1
    while n > 0:
        digit = n % 10
        total += digit ** 3
        n //= 10
    return total

def sum_of_cubes(n):
    total = -1
    while n > 0:
        digit = n % 10
        total += digit ** 3
        n //= 10
    return total
